trans-unit.source: Provides the functionality that allows a common language runtime host to participate in the flow, or migration, of the execution context.
trans-unit.target: 提供功能，讓 Common Language Runtime 主機可以參與執行內容的流動或移轉。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.AppDomainManager> has a reference to a <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager> in its <xref:System.AppDomainManager.HostExecutionContextManager%2A> property, then the common language runtime calls the manager every time a call to the <xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext.Run%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method occurs, to allow the host to participate in the flow of the execution context.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前<xref:System.AppDomainManager>參考到<xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager>中其<xref:System.AppDomainManager.HostExecutionContextManager%2A>屬性，則 common language runtime 呼叫管理員每次呼叫<xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext.Run%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，就會發生，允許主應用程式參與的執行流程內容。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Captures the host execution context from the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 從目前的執行緒擷取主機執行內容。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext" /> object representing the host execution context of the current thread.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext" /> 物件，表示目前執行緒的主機執行內容。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> is created using a safe handle containing the `IUnknown` pointer for the host executing the current thread.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>使用安全控制代碼，包含建立`IUnknown`主機執行目前執行緒的指標。

trans-unit.source: The previous context state to revert to.
trans-unit.target: 要還原的先前內容狀態。

trans-unit.source: Restores the host execution context to its prior state.
trans-unit.target: 將主機執行內容還原成先前的狀態。

trans-unit.source: `previousState` must be the object returned by the <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.SetHostExecutionContext%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: `previousState` 必須物件傳回<xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.SetHostExecutionContext%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="previousState" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="previousState" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="previousState" /> was not created on the current thread.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="previousState" /> 不是在目前的執行緒上建立。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="previousState" /> is not the last state for the <see cref="T:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="previousState" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext" /> 最後的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext" /> to be set.
trans-unit.target: 要設定的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the current host execution context to the specified host execution context.
trans-unit.target: 將目前的主機執行內容設定成指定的主機執行內容。

trans-unit.source: An object for restoring the <see cref="T:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext" /> to its previous state.
trans-unit.target: 物件，用來將 <see cref="T:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext" /> 還原成先前的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.SetHostExecutionContext%2A> method sets the host execution context for the current <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.SetHostExecutionContext%2A>方法會設定目前的主機執行內容<xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> that has been used as the argument to another <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.SetHostExecutionContext%2A> method call cannot be passed in as the parameter for this method.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> ，已用做為另一個引數<xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.SetHostExecutionContext%2A>方法呼叫無法傳入做為這個方法的參數。

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext.CreateCopy%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to create a copy of a <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> object and then use the copy to set the host execution context.
trans-unit.target: 請改用<xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext.CreateCopy%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法來建立一份<xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>物件，然後使用複製設定的主機執行內容。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.Revert%2A> method using the object returned by this method to restore the <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> to its previous state.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.Revert%2A>方法使用這個方法所傳回的物件還原<xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>至其先前的狀態。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="hostExecutionContext" /> was not acquired through a capture operation.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="hostExecutionContext" /> 不是透過擷取作業取得。

trans-unit.source: -or-

<paramref name="hostExecutionContext" /> has been the argument to a previous <see cref="M:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.SetHostExecutionContext(System.Threading.HostExecutionContext)" /> method call.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="hostExecutionContext" /> 是先前 <see cref="M:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.SetHostExecutionContext(System.Threading.HostExecutionContext)" /> 方法呼叫的引數。

trans-unit.source: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。
